title: ðŸ“¦ Mobile release - 1.16
body:
Issue to manage mobile release 1.16

### Scope

https://github.com/status-im/status-react/milestone/55

- release notes: https://notes.status.im/s/DpgeartDT
- release branch: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/tree/release/1.16.x

### Testing info 
[comment]: # (TestRail info, added by QA)
Main test suite: https://ethstatus.testrail.net/index.php?/runs/view/7803&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc
Upgrade (e2e): https://ethstatus.testrail.net/index.php?/runs/view/7802&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc

### Builds in TestFlight and PlayStore to push as a release
[comment]: # (Will be added by QA after testing approving of build)
**APK:** https://status-im-releases.ams3.digitaloceanspaces.com/StatusIm-Mobile-v1.16.0-ef34af-universal.apk
**IPA:** 1.16.0 (202110827125911)

### Process
#### 1) Kick-off
- [x] 1. Translation PRs is merged before cutting branch (Jinho)
- [x] 2. Prepare scope of visible changes based on commits history, started from previous release branch cut ([example]( https://notes.status.im/1.14-release-notes?view))
- [x] 3. Update [RELEASES.md](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/RELEASES.md) with release notes (make PR based on previous step)
- [x] 4. Create 1.16.0 release branch and get successful builds (doc is [here](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/doc/RELEASE_GUIDE.md) so, testing can be started)
- [x] 5. Based on release scope, ask for comms (Jonny) 
- [x] 6. Make sure that assets (screenshots, video) in stores are up to date. If should be updated, ask @cammellos  for help

#### 2) Testing
[comment]: # (Section will be maintained by QA)
- [x] Dogfooding (add notes, if it was held) 
- [x] Regression testing for release candidate build
- [x] Upgrade tests
- [x] Fix known blocker(s) found during regression testing

##### Blockers
[comment]: # (Section for blocker issues; should be fixed and merged by release-manager. Remove if no blockers found)
- [x] 1 blocker: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/12511

=============================================================================================

- [x] Cherry-pick fix(es) to the release branch
- [x] Verify fix(es) on new release candidate build
- [x] Retest
- [x] Keep release build forever (button in Jenkins)

#### 3) Submission

- [x] 1. Release notes written and added (500 character limit for updates (Android) and PR for [RELEASES.md](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/RELEASES.md) is ready to be merged (from 1.3 step)
- [x] 2. Submit beta version for Android (Open Testing in Play Store)
- [x] 3. Submit iOS build to Apple review ([instruction](https://drive.google.com/file/d/10Cl7PBB7TFPkZiVbfzdFGpfMRP9bxXuq/view?usp=sharing), be careful - low quality of audio)
- [x] 4. Play store content reviewed and updated
- [x] 5. Privacy policy reviewed and updated (ask in channel)
- [x] 6. Countries to be excluded (ask in channel) 
- [x] 7. Changes to our FAQ made (should be checked and if any changes needed, ask Jakub to made them)
- [x] 8. Prepare PR for F-droid build ([instruction]( https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/doc/FDROID.md))

#### 4) Before publishing
- [x] 1. Translations for comms available (marketing, ask in the channel)
- [x] 2. Promotional content ready (marketing, ask in channel)
- [x] 3. Upload builds for DO store,  https://dev.status.im/ (Jakub)

#### 5) At time of publishing
- [x] 1. Notify marketing to push comms and blog post (Jonny)
- [x] 2. Publish release to app store and playstore
- [x] 3. Final push to update prod site https://status.im/,  [instructions](https://github.com/status-im/infra-docs/blob/master/articles/status_release_upload.md) (Jakub - requires credentials to upload) 
- [x] 4. Add the link to the post about the release and publish the release: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/releases (Jakub)
- [x] 5. Merge PR for updating [RELEASES.md](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/RELEASES.md) (from 1.3 step)
